title: Rudi Giuliani was banned from Twitter for Pizzagate Twits.
subtitle: @Rodolf Gioliani's Twitter account (not belonging to the former mayor of New York City) was posted after sending messages about conspiracy theory #Pizagate.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The former Mayor of New York City, Rudy Giuliani, was stopped from Twitter after sending messages about Pizzaguet.
